subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: To accommodate Ilya Kovalchuk’s 15-year, $100 million contract, the Devils have 19 days to shed $3 million to $5 million in payroll to squeeze under the league’s salary cap.
snippet: To accommodate Ilya Kovalchuk’s 15-year, $100 million contract, the Devils have 19 days to shed $3 million to $5 million in payroll to squeeze under the league’s salary cap.
